'''Tricks of the Trouble-Maker''' is [[Yoimiya]]'s [[1st Ascension Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Yoimiya's first and fourth Normal Attacks are two-hit attacks and can each grant 2 stacks of Tricks of the Trouble-Maker.
* Gaining a new stack will refresh the duration of the old ones.
* The saltpeter around Yoimiya will be surrounded by '''one''' faint glowing circle when she has at least '''5''' stacks of Tricks of the Trouble-Maker, '''two''' glowing circles when she has at least '''7''' stacks of Tricks of the Trouble-Maker, and '''three''' glowing circles when she has at least '''9''' stacks of Tricks of the Trouble-Maker.

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|character=Yoimiya|talent=Tricks of the Trouble-Maker|ascension|2|Summer Night's Dawn|Grants a 10% to 20% ATK buff to nearby party members, excluding Yoimiya, for 15s upon using Ryuukin Saxifrage, based on Tricks of the Trouble-Maker stacks.}}
